column1: '''Geldrop''' is a Dutch town which has a [http://maps.google.nl/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=nl&geocode=&q=Geldrop&aq=2&sll=52.469397
column7: 0.01929&z=16 neighbourhood] with streets named after several characters from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Legendarium]]
column8: while the main road is named ''Tolkien Avenue'' (Dutch: Laan van Tolkien). Though the neighbourhood has streets with names of lesser known characters as [[Farin]]
column10: there is no street named after one of the best known characters

column7: 0.022724&z=16 "The Neighbourhood of Tolkien" on GoogleMaps] (Dutch: De Wijk van Tolkien)
